description: Carrots, potatoes, turnips ... All of those heartwarming roots that you know and love!
Underground part of some plants, rich in simple sugars. You may know them as Onions and Garlic
Leafy (lettuce, spinach, ...) and stem (aspargus, broccoli, ...) greens!
Tomatoes and cucumbers are fruits and peppers are berries. Technically these are not veggies, but we use them as if they were!
Apples, bananas, strawberries and much much more!
Basil, mint, rosemary, thyme. Fresh herbs, with soft or hard stalk, that bring flavour to your dish!
Rice, nuts and much else!
An specific type of seeds, that comes in a pod. Includes peas, beans and others!
Basically mushrooms. Neither animal nor vegetable but delicious afterall.
Chicken and other poutry cuts, such as duck!
Delicious cuts with a intense red colour.
Bacon, pork ribs, panceta, you name it! Delicous and mostly fatty cuts.
Clean source of protein and good fats, fish is one of the most diverse cathegory you'll find!
Prawns, oysters, clams and everything that comes from the bottom of the ocean!
Classic ingredient. Most famous one is the chicken egg, but you'll find use for quail eggs and others.
Products derived from milk! Being it cow's milk or goat's milk. All types of chesses, yoghurts, creams and much more.
Butter and vegetable oils and pastes. They bring flavours together and add loads to your dish.
Vinegar, ketchup, mustard and other condiments you may have in your pantry.
Salt, dried oregano, chili flakes, black pepper, ... You name it!
A diverse variety of cooking wines, bourbons, sakes and many other drinks.
A good stock can pack your meal with deliciousness. Sauces add texture and flavour to the final dish!
Sugars, sweeteners, chocolates and all that sweet goodness!
Flours and ingredients that derive from it: dried pasta and different tupes of bread!
Everything with a blade: chefs knife, paring knife, peeler, grader, ...
Kitchen equipment that you use along other equipments. Includes spatula, whisk, cutting board and others.
Frying pans, sauce pans, stock pots and everything you use to cook on a stove!
Bowls, trays and other equipments that hold the food you're cooking!
Cling film, parchment paper and other one time use equipments.
Everything that generates heat in order to cook your food. Stoves, oven, barbecue grill, microwave, ...
Fridges, freezers and other equipments that help store your food
Blenders, processors, mixer and other eletronic home appliances!
All different types of cuts: dicing, mincing, baton, chiffonade, ...
How to accentuate and increment the flavours in your dish!
Ways to preserve your food properly to create the most diverse effects on flavour and texture!
Mixing techniques (easy and hard ones) that create a range of effects in you dish.
Every technique that is related to the before-cooking part of the creation of a dish
Techniques to make the best food on the oven.
Techniques to cook on the stove top, a direct and constant source of heat.
Unconventional ways to cook delicious food
How to create beautiful and eyecatching dishes!
